definition: used to say that you think you know, remember, understand, etc. sth but you cannot be completely sure, especially because you do not know all the facts
rude and offensive remarks
as quickly, much, soon, etc. as you can
a non-specific time in the future
the back part of the cover of a book or magazine
a list of books, etc. that have been used by sb writing an article, etc.
used to introduce a comment or question that is not directly related to what you have been talking about
used to express good wishes when parting or at the end of conversation
frightening, usually because it is connected with something violent or cruel
made of many different things or parts that are connected; difficult to understand
a list of the different sections that are contained in a book
a paper cover on a book that protects it but that can be removed
to give somebody the power or authority to do something
to make it possible for somebody/something to do something
to build a wall, fence, etc. around something
to give sb support, courage or hope
to make something bigger; to become bigger
to make sure that something happens or is definite
to give somebody the right to have or to do something
to make somebody responsible for doing something or taking care of somebody
showing or able to show your thoughts and feelings
